discussion.p: C17 subclause 7.17.7.5 provides atomic_fetch_xor and atomic_fetch_xor_explicit. stdatomic.h in the working draft () does not.
C++20 has both of them, too, so it should definitely be in the common subset.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after eight votes in favour during reflector poll.
